entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 35.
